parameters.name: ArcRadius
parameters.description: Radius for the circular note pattern

parameters.name: ArcAngle
parameters.description: Angle relative to the notes being patterned

parameters.name: PatternNum
parameters.description: Total number of pattern instances, including the seed geometry

parameters.name: PatternSpacing
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances in radians

parameters.name: PatternRotate
parameters.description: True to rotate the pattern, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete, passed as a string formatted as "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

title: IDrawingDoc.InsertCircularNotePattern
description: Inserts a circular note pattern using the selected note.
signature:
System.Boolean InsertCircularNotePattern( 
   System.Double
ArcRadius
,
   System.Double
ArcAngle
,
   System.Int32
PatternNum
,
   System.Double
PatternSpacing
,
   System.Boolean
PatternRotate
,
   System.String
DeleteInstances
)

parameters.name: ArcRadius
parameters.description: Radius for the circular note pattern

parameters.name: ArcAngle
parameters.description: Angle relative to the notes being patterned

parameters.name: PatternNum
parameters.description: Total number of pattern instances, including the seed geometry

parameters.name: PatternSpacing
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances in radians

parameters.name: PatternRotate
parameters.description: True to rotate the pattern, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete, passed as a string formatted as "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

returns: True if the circular note pattern is created, false if not
